Title: Establishes a temporary commission to investigate the influence of outside agitators on peaceful protests; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes a temporary commission to investigate the influence of outside agitators on peaceful protests; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing a temporary commission to investigate the influence of outside agitators on peaceful protests; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
